import React from 'react' import { ThemeProvider } from 'styled-components' import { BrowserRouter, Switch, Route } from 'react-router-dom' import Home from './containers/Home' import { TodoList } from './containers/TodoList' import theme from './theme' import UserName from './containers/Home/username' import { useState } from 'react' import FormInput from './containers/TodoList/components/FormInput' // const userName = "Guest" const [userName, setUserName] = useState("Guest") const App = () => { const [userName, setUserName] = useState("Guest") return(
{!!userName ? : }
) } export default App
